version_description:
Fixed the black layer bug.

What's new in Sketches 16:
A version specifically dedicated to the iPhone with many improvements :
Folders
Text tool
Tool's blending mode selection
Brush editor
New paper textures and colors.

And

iOS 11 Files integration.
Multilayer PSD import and export.
Open and write document of any size

Fixed a bug with the iPhone settings screen.

What's new in Version 17:
iOS 11 Files integration.
Multilayer PSD import and export.
Open and write document of any size.

New import function to access "Files"
Multilayer PSD import and export.
Open and write document of any size
iOS 11 integration.

New import function to access Files
Multilayer PSD import and export
Transparent paper
Better iOS 11 integration.

A new toolbar to manage drawings more easily.
Better PSD support

Better translations
Tracked bugs

Removed weight and bugs.
Share now available in the browser.
Fixed a bug that crashes when restoring IAP

New Ruler Edition :
Symmetry, curve, spline, circle, grid and shapes!
And different options to use them as cutouts.
Fix missing buttons on non-retina devices.

Special Zen Edition :

We introduce a new zen mode where most of the UI disappears to give you a clean canvas to draw on.
We also designed a completely new onboarding and help system for a much smoother first experience.

Enjoy many new too

v20.1 : A unique quote salutes you at launch and small fixes

v20 : Special Zen Edition :
We introduce a new zen mode where most of the UI disappears to give you a clean canvas to draw on.
We also designed a completely new onboarding and help
Blur smudge is back and other fixes.
Fixed many bugs including pixelating felt pen and missing lined paper

为了在这段长时间内为孩子们带来一些安慰，我们添加了一个全新的活动文件夹。
每天发现由我们的艺术家创作的一些新的原创活动，特别是针对此场合。
呆在家里，在创意活动中放松身心。

修订版
为了在这段长时间内为孩子们带来一些安慰，我们添加了一个全新的活动文件夹。
每天发现由我们的艺术家创作的一些新的原创活动，特别是针对此场合。
呆在家里，在创意活动中放松身心。
Minor issues fixed
Small design edits and fixed bugs
Small bugs fixed

完全进行设计了彩笔工具，新的工具更加逼真。
彩笔渲染效果因实际情况而已，具体情况取决于每张纸。 在“ Le Grand Bloc”上尝试一下，太棒了！
此外，借助具有扩展功能的新画笔编辑器，您可以调整参数，例如纹理量或工具的干燥度。
